text: Zito André Sebastião Luvumbo (born 9 March 2002) is an Angolan footballer who plays as a right winger in Italy for Cagliari. ==Club career== Born in Luanda, Luvumbo began his career with Primeiro de Agosto, and underwent a trial with English club Manchester United's academy in February 2019. He was also linked with a transfer to English club West Ham United. On 23 September 2020, he signed a 5-year contract with Italian Serie A club Cagliari. ==International career== Luvumbo played for Angola under-17s, and received his first-call up to the senior team in August 2019. In September 2019, he made his debut with the Angola national football team in the 0–1 away win against Gambia. ==References== Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:Angolan footballers Category:Angola youth international footballers Category:Angola international footballers Category:C.D. title: Zito Luvumbo
